QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, odf_fields.id odf_pk, odf_fields.CODE code, odf_fields.METADATA_URL metadata_url, CREATED.FULL_NAME created_by, odf_fields.UI_COLUMN ui_column, odf_fields.SECTION_ID section_id, odf_fields.UI_ROW ui_row, odf_fields.NAME name, odf_fields.UI_WIDTH width, UPDATED.FULL_NAME updated_by, ODF_FIELDS.CREATED_DATE created_date, odf_ca_odf_field.partition_code partition_code, ODF_FIELDS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE last_updated_date, odf_fields.UI_HEIGHT height, section_id.blueprint_id odf_grand_parent_id from odf_fields odf_fields, odf_sections odf_sections, srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED, odf_ca_odf_field odf_ca_odf_field, (select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, odf_sections.id odf_pk, odf_sections.BLUEPRINT_ID blueprint_id from odf_sections odf_sections where 1 = 1 ) section_id where 1 = 1 and odf_fields.section_id = odf_sections.id and odf_fields.created_by = CREATED.user_id and odf_fields.last_updated_by = UPDATED.user_id and odf_fields.id = odf_ca_odf_field.id and odf_fields.SECTION_ID = section_id.odf_pk
